messages:
Name: Carlos Gruezo
Nationality: Ecuador
Date of Birth: April 19, 1995
Position: Midfielder
Current club: San Jose Earthquakes
MLS clubs played for: Dallas, San Jose Earthquakes

San Jose Earthquakes midfielder Carlos Gruezo has appeared in the majority of the team's MLS games in 2024, making 24 appearances overall and playing 1,977 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in 23 of these appearances across their 34 fixtures and come on as a substitute on one occasion.
The last MLS game that Gruezo played came on October 19 for San Jose Earthquakes against Los Angeles; a match that he played 90 minutes in during a 3-1 loss. He has amassed nine yellow cards.
In last season's MLS, Gruezo appeared in 29 games for San Jose Earthquakes and created two assists.
Prior to joining San Jose Earthquakes in January 2023, Gruezo made 69 league appearances in total at Augsburg, providing one assist.
